https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/o4UIO9z8nWrC7c5ivBPLX7JDoDg.jpg Yukio is your average high school student who spends his days going to class and avoiding bullies. That is until he meets Ryusuke, a guitar prodigy. Together with Taira, Chiba, and Saku they form the rock band BECK. As their popularity increases so does the danger as Ryusuke's past catches up with him. BECK
